item.title: Automatically keeping the intermediate history of your work using git
item.description: This is another tool for your toolbox: using git to automatically document your development process (special cases only.) Context When I’m spiking a feature, I usually get in the zone (e.g., Csikszentmihalyi’s Flow), and I can forget my good engineering practices, searching for that desired answer. After a few of those bouts of coding, you realize you’re wandering. You circle around, get lost, get back on track, then get lost again.
